Description: The env_spritetrain entity resembles an [env_sprite](../env_sprite) which can move along [path_corner](../path_corner) entities as a [func_train](../func_train) can. Ever wanted to make a flame travel along a fuse to a bomb? This entity is for you.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Set name of {{ entname }} so other entities can trigger it to start or stop sprite movement. Depending on trigger use-type: 'On'- start movement, 'Off'- stop movement, 'Toggle'- toggle movement. Can be kill-targeted but sprite is not removed, only the 'train' part.
Set a sprite here. Path starts in modification's folder.
Scaling factor for the sprite. Defaults to 0.25 if not set.

Notes: Spritetrains are not efficient on the network-code. You should use them as little as possible and only temporarily.
